text: (visvasavantayini! obava allahge) dutaya aradhana kalahot (eya) oba, oba atare keneku anit kenava aradhana karannak men nositanu. (ohuge aradhanavata anivaryayen savan denu). niyata vasayenma obagen kavurun (apage dutaya ræs kala sabhaven) rahase lessa yannoda, ovunva allah hondin danneya. ebævin kavurun ohuge niyogayanta venaska karannoda, ovun tamanta yamkisi vipatak ho nætahot vedana gena dena danduvama ho pæmina sendu vanu ætæyi yanna gæna biya vemin sitiya yutuya
